Posts.Content: I found a small lump at the top of my right breast. My left breast is painful down the side and also down my arm sometimes. The doctor wasn't that worried ( I am sure they all say that though) She said it could be due to menopause (Im 45) She has referred me anyway got my appointment through for just dead on 2 weeks time 5th February. I am so scared and just thinking it will be cancer my grandma had breast cancer. Not sue what ill do when I get the diagnose.
Posts.Title: Small lump

Posts.Content: Thank you. What will be will be. Had an awful day yesterday thinking was ifs and I know you can't live Iife like that. Fingers crossed it is nothing xx
